OOC: though you and I know what Godfather means, Astroblast 
doesn't.

--- Astroblast ---

Astroblast's external speakers sound, "We aren't a family, but if 
you want to join our faction, you'll have to talk to Megatron. Oh, 
and right now, your orders are to cover our exit from the battle 
field." Astroblast finishes knowing that Megatron didn't order that, 
but he needed to get the trailers off his back if Switchblade's demo 
charges didn't do it for him.


On 17 May 2001, at 21:18, Alloran2@... wrote:

> :::Godfather/Sharpedge:::
> 
> Godfather: Alirght!
> ::He activates his jetpack and flies up to Astroblast::
> Godfather: Yo, me an' my buddy over there want to join your family(mob
> talk for asking to join the Decepticons). ~~~~~ ::Sharpedge smiles
> widely:: Sharpedge: Yessss. Ive been hungry for destruction! I haven't
> killed anyone since Testifier! ::He follows everyone else::
>
